631:1: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattva ādita eva anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāvutpanne citte bahukuśalamūlasaṃbhārasamudāgataśca bhavati,
631:14: so'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya prajñāpāramitāyāmabhiyukto mārān pāpīyaso'dhitiṣṭhati tena prajñābalena ca-yathā me mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso'vatāraṃ na labheran,
631:18: nāpi cittamutpādayanti-kimiti vayamasya bodhisattvasya avatāraṃ gaveṣāmahe,
631:23: saṃvignāśca bhavanti-mā vayaṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyāma iti |
631:26: anenāpi suvikrāntavikrāmin paryāyeṇa bodhisattvasya mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso'ntarāyāya prayupasthitā avatāraṃ na labhante ||
631:27: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ deśyamānāyāṃ chandaśca adhyāśayaśca gauravaṃ va citrīkāraśca śāstṛsaṃjñā ca utpāditā bhavati |
631:28: na ca ṣaṭpāramitāsaṃyuktāyāṃ kathāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā utpāditā bhavati,
631:29: nāpi gambhāīrān dharmān śrutvā kāṅkṣāyitatvaṃ vā dhandhāyitatvaṃ vā vicikitsāyitatvaṃ vā utpāditaṃ bhavati,
631:32: anye ca bahavaḥ sattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpitā bhavanti,
631:34: tasya pūrvāśayacittaviśuddhitayā pūrvāśayāsaṃkliṣṭatayā na mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso'ntarāyāya pratyupasthitā bhavanti,
631:39: anenāpi suvikrāntavikrāmin paryāyeṇa bodhisattvasya mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso na viheṭhāya pratyupasthitā bhavanti ||
631:40: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpayoganimitte carati,
631:52: na vedanā-na saṃjñā-na saṃskāra-na vijñānaviśuddhinimitte carati |
631:55: na vedanā-na saṃjñā-na saṃskāra-na vijñānārambaṇaviśuddhinimitte carati,
631:56: na vedanā-na saṃjñā-na saṃskāra-na vijñānārambaṇaviśuddhyanimitte carati |
631:59: na vedanā-na saṃjñā-na saṃskāra-na vijñānasaṃbhavaviśuddhisaṃyoge carati,
631:63: na vedanā-na saṃjñā-na saṃskāra-na vijñānārambaṇa-svabhāvaviśuddhisaṃyoge carati,
631:66: na vedanā-na saṃjñā-na saṃskāra-na vijñānaprakṛtiviśuddhau carati |
631:69: na vedanā-na saṃjñā-na saṃskāra-na vijñānārambaṇaprakṛtiviśuddhivisaṃyoge carati |
631:71: na vedanā-na saṃjñā-na saṃskāra-na vijñānātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhau carati |
631:79: na rūpārambaṇātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhivisaṃyoge na vedanā-na saṃjñā-na saṃskāra-na vijñānārambaṇātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhisaṃyoge carati,
631:81: evaṃ caran na rūpeṇa saṃyujyate na visaṃyujyate |
631:92: na pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ saṃyujyate na visaṃyujyate |
631:116: sarvadharmā hi suvikrāntavikrāmin na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ |
631:118: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin sarvadharmāḥ saṃyogena pratyupasthitā na visaṃyogena |
631:121: sarvadharmāṇāṃ hi suvikrāntavikrāmin na kaścidavabodhaḥ yena saṃyujyeran vā visaṃyujyeran vā |
631:122: sarvadharmāṇāṃ hi suvikrāntavikrāmin na kaścitsaṃyogāya pratyupasthito na visaṃyogāya |
631:123: sacet suvikrāntavikrāmin dharmāṇāṃ kaścitsaṃyojayitā vā visaṃyojayitā vā abhaviṣyat,
631:130: prajñāpayettathāgataḥ-ayamasau dharmāṇāṃ kārako vā kārayitā vā,
631:136: yasmāttarhi vikrāntavikrāmin sarvadharmāṇāṃ na kaścitsaṃyogāya pratyupasthito na visaṃyogāya,
631:137: tasmānna kaściddharmāṇāṃ kārako vā kārayitā vā,
631:145: na ca viparyāsaḥ kenacitsaṃyukto vā visaṃyukto vā |
631:152: na cātra kaściddharma upalabhyate yo'sau viparyāsa ityucyeta |
631:153: viparyāsa iti suvikrāntavikrāmin vipratilambha eṣa sattvānām,
631:157: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin bāladārako riktena muṣṭinollāpitaḥ saṃjānāti bhūtamiti,
631:158: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin bālapṛthagjanā ucchedena viparyāsenollāpitā mūḍhā evaṃ manyante-bhūtametaditi |
631:159: te abhūte bhūtasaṃjñino viparyāsagrastā durmocyā bhavanti tasmādviparyāsāt |
631:160: evaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin sarvabālapṛthagjanā asaṃyuktā avisaṃyuktā bandhanabaddhāḥ saṃdhāvanti |
631:167: yaḥ punaḥ saṃyogaṃ nopalabhate na manyate nābhiniviśate,
631:170: sacedvisaṃyogaṃ manyeta vā upalabheta vā abhiniviśeta vā,
631:172: tatra suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattva imamarthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyan na kenaciddharmeṇa saṃyujyate na visaṃyujyate,
631:173: nāpi kasyaciddharmasya saṃyogāya pratyupasthito bhavati na visaṃyogāya |
631:174: iyaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saṃyogavisaṃyogaparijñā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ |
631:175: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ kṣipraṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ pāramadhigacchati ||
631:176: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpāsaṅgatāyāṃ carati,
631:177: na vedanā-na saṃjñā-na saṃskāra-na vijñānāsaṅgatāyāṃ carati |
631:179: na vedanā-na saṃjñā-na saṃskāra-na vijñānasaṅgaviśuddhau carati |
631:181: na vedanā-na saṃjñā-na saṃskāra-na vijñānāsaṅgārambaṇe carati |
631:184: na vedanā-na saṃjñā-na saṃskāra-na vijñānāsaṅgatāsaṃyoge carati,
631:188: na vedanā-na saṃjñā-na saṃskāra-na vijñānāsaṅgatāviśuddhisaṃyoge carati,
631:192: na vedanā-na saṃjñā-na saṃskāra-na vijñānārambaṇaviśuddhisaṃyoge carati,
631:195: sarvāṇi hyetāni suvikrāntavikrāmin na iñjitāni nimittāni spanditāni caritāni vicaritāni bodhisattvena parijñātāni |
631:197: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpātītānāgatapratyutpannasaṅgatāyāṃ carati,
631:199: na vedanā-na saṃjñā-na saṃskāra-na vijñānātītānāgatapratyutpannasaṅgatāyāṃ carati,
631:203: na vedanā-na saṃjñā-na saṃskāra-na vijñānātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhau carati,
631:210: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃścaryāṃ samanupaśyati |
631:213: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ kṣipraṃ sarvajñatādharmaparipūrimadhigacchati ||
631:214: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpaṃ vivṛtamiti carati,
631:216: na vedanā va saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ |
631:221: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ |
631:226: na vedanā va saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ |
631:230: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ |
631:232: na rūpamatītānāgatapratyutpannaṃ prakṛtiviviktaṃ vā prakṛtiśāntaṃ vā carati |
631:233: na rūpamatītānāgatapratyutpannaṃ prakṛtyaviviktaṃ cā prakṛtyaśāntaṃ vā carati |
631:234: na vedanā na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārāḥ |
631:235: na vijñānamatītānāgatapratyuatpannaṃ prakṛtiviviktaṃ vā prakṛtiśāntaṃ vā carati,
631:236: na vijñānamatītānāgatapratyutpannaṃ prakṛtiviviktaṃ vā prakṛttiśāntaṃ vā carati |
631:237: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ kṣipraṃ sarvajñatādharmaparipūrimadhigacchati ||
631:238: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ na manyate |
631:239: evaṃ na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān |
631:256: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ kṣipraṃ sarvajñatādharmaparipūriṃ gacchati |
631:257: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattva āsanno bhavati daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānām,
631:261: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattva āsanno dvātriṃśatāṃ mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇanām |
631:269: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ kṣipraṃ sarvabuddhadharmaparipūrimadhigacchati |
631:270: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ kṣipraṃ buddhakṣetrapariśuddhimadhigacchati |
631:272: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na rūpe pratiṣṭhate,
631:308: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin sarvadharmāṇāṃ pratiṣṭhānaṃ vidyate |
631:313: ālayo vā kūṭastho vā dharmāṇāmabhaviṣyat, ni(nya ?)
631:317: yasmāttarhi suvikrāntavikrāmin sarvadharmā apratiṣṭhitāḥ anālayāḥ asaṃcayāḥ,
631:319: tasmāttathāgato dharmāṇāṃ pratiṣṭhānaṃ vā ālayaṃ vā saṃcayaṃ vā na nirdiśati |
631:326: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin catasṛṇāṃ mahānadīnāmanavataptāt sarasaḥ prasravantīnāṃ nāstyadhiṣṭhānamanyatra mahāsamudrāt,
631:329: anabhisaṃskāra iti suvikrāntavikrāmin na tatra sthānaṃ nāsthānaṃ nādhiṣṭhānam,
631:331: sthānamiti vā adhiṣṭhānamiti vā asthānamiti vā abhisaṃskāra iti suvikrāntavikrāmin gaṇanaiṣā nirdiṣṭā |
631:335: ayaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya sarvadharmāpratiṣṭhānayogaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ |
631:336: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ kṣipraṃ sarvajñadharmān paripūrayati,
631:342: tasmāttarhi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvena mahāsattvena arthaṃ kartukāmena,
631:363: dharmacakraṃ pravartayitukāmena apravartitapūrvaṃ śramaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā māreṇa vā brahmaṇā vā anyena vā punaḥ kenacillokena sahadharmeṇa,
631:368: sarvasattvānāṃ pūrvapraṇidhānakuśalamūlāni saṃcodayitukāmena asyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ ghaṭitavyaṃ vyāyacchitavyaṃ prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyogamanuyuktena bhavitavyam |
631:369: nāhaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya kaṃciddharmamevaṃ kṣipraṃ paripūrikaraṃ samanupaśyāmi sarvadharmāṇāṃ yatheha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathānirdiṣṭāyāmabhiyogaḥ pratipattiḥ asya vihārasyānutsargaḥ yaduta prajñāpāramitāvihārāya ||
631:370: ye kecitsuvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā asyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti,
631:371: niṣṭhā tatra gantavyā-āsannā ime bodhisattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiviti |
631:372: yeṣāṃ keṣāṃcit suvikrāntavikrāmin iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā śrotrāvabhāsamapyāgamiṣyati,
631:375: teṣāmapyahaṃ kuśalamūlamanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherāhārakaṃ vadāmi-niṣṭhā ca tatra gantavyā-mahāprajñāsaṃbhāropacitā hyete kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā,
631:377: yeṣāṃ ca suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvānāmayaṃ prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyaparivartanirdeśo hastaṃ gamiṣyati,
631:378: kiṃcāpi tatra kecinna vyākṛtā bhaviṣyanti saṃmukhaṃ buddhairbhagavadbhiḥ,
631:381: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye sattvā daśakuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartante,
631:382: niṣṭhā tatra gantavyā-āsannā hyete sattvā uttarakuruṣūpapatteḥ |
631:383: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yasya kasyacidbodhisattvasya iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā hasyaṃ gamiṣyati,
631:385: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye sattvā dānaṃ prayacchanti muktatyāgāśca bhavanti,
631:386: sattvāṃśca dānena priyavadyatayā arthacaryayā samānārthatayā ca saṃgṛhṇanti,
631:389: niṣṭhā tatra gantavyā-kṣipramime sattvā mahābhogā bhavantyuccakulīnāśca ||
631:390: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye sattvā dānaśīlāśca bhavanti śīlasaṃpannāśca bhavanti,
631:397: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yasya kasyacidbodhisattvasya iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā hastagatā bhaviṣyati,
631:399: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin yasya rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya pūrṇāyāṃ pūrṇamāsyāṃ pañcadaśyāṃ purato'rthakaraṇe saṃniṣaṇṇasya cakraratnaṃ prādurbhavati,
631:402: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yasya bodhisattvasya ayaṃ prajñāpāramitāparivarto hastaṃ gamiṣyati,
631:404: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye sattvā utkṛṣṭakuśalamūlasamanvāgatāśca bhaviṣyanti śobhanasamācārāśca bhaviṣyanti,
631:412: ye kecitsuvikrāntavikrāmin pariśuddhataraiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ samanvāgatā utkṛṣṭakuśalamūlāśca pūrvaṃ ca dāna dadati paścātsvayaṃ bhuñjate,
631:413: prāk cānyeṣāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtyāni kurvanti paścādātmanaḥ,
631:419: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yasya kasyacidbodhisattvasya iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā upanaṃsyate,
631:421: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye sattvāścaturṇāṃ brahmavihārāṇāṃ lābhino bhavanti,
631:423: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yasya kasyacid bodhisattvasya ayaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśa upanaṃsyate,
631:425: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin vārṣikeṣu māseṣu pratyupasthiteṣu iyaṃ mahāpṛthivī meghān pratītya snigdhā bhavati,
631:430: evamiyaṃ mahāpṛthivī abhyantarā ca abhiṣyanditā snigdhā ca bhavati,
631:434: te'bhiṣyanditāḥ santo bahūn śākhāpatrapalāśān muñcanti bahupuṣpaphalāśca bhavanti,
631:436: evamiyaṃ mahāpṛthivī puṣpaphalotsasarastaḍāgaistasmin samaye upaśobhitā bhavati |
631:437: tataśca tuṣṭā bhavanti manuṣyāśca amanuṣyāśca tāni puṣpaphalāni paribhuñjamānāstaṃ ca gandhaṃ jighrantaḥ |
631:438: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yadā bodhisattvasya iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā abhimukhī bhavati,
631:444: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye'navataptasya nāgarājasya bhavane sattvā upapannāḥ,
631:445: te catvāro mahānadīrutsṛjati yā mahāsamudraṃ saṃtarpayanti |
631:446: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yeṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmiyaṃ prajñāpāramitā hastamupanaṃsyati,
631:450: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye kecitsattvāḥ sumeroḥ parvatarājasyāntikamupasaṃkrāmanti,
631:451: sarve te ekavarṇā bhavanti yaduta suvarṇavarṇā bhavanti |
631:452: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yeṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmayaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśo hastagato bhaviṣyati,
631:453: sarve te ekāṃ gatiṃ gamiṣyanti yaduta tathāgatagatiṃ sarvajñatāgatim ||
631:454: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin sāgaro mahāsamudraḥ sarvodakasaṃdhārayitā,
631:456: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yasya kasyacidbodhisattvasya ayaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśo hastagato bhaviṣyati,
631:457: niṣṭhā tatra gantavyā-kṣipramayaṃ sarvadharmasāgaratāṃ sarvadharmabhājanatāṃ sarvadharmasamavasaraṇatāmanuprāpsyati,
631:459: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin sūryamaṇḍalamabhyudgacchat sarvā diśaḥ prabhādhyāmīkaroti,
631:460: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo'syāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvasattvānāṃ dharmāvabhāsakṛtyena pratyutpasthito bhavati,
631:461: ihābhyudgacchan suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ kuśalamūlāvabhāsena pratyupasthito bhavati,
631:466: asyāṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo'gratāyāṃ śikṣate,
631:469: eṣā hi suvikrāntavikrāmin agrā śikṣā jyeṣṭhā varā pravarā anuttarā niruttarā yeyaṃ prajñāpāramitāśikṣā |
631:470: asyāṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ sarvaśikṣāpāramitāṃ prāpnoti,
631:474: asyāṃ hi suvikrāntavikrāmin śikṣāyāmatītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ carantaḥ śikṣitāḥ śikṣiṣyante śikṣante ca |
631:475: asyāṃ ca śikṣāyāṃ supratiṣṭhitā buddhā bhagavantaḥ sarvasattvebhyo'nuttarāṃ śikṣāpariśuddhiṃ saṃprakāśitavantaḥ,
631:480: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na kasmiṃściddharme śikṣito bhavati laukike vā lokottare vā,
631:487: sarvadharmā hi suvikrāntavikrāmin asaktā abaddhā amuktāḥ |
631:488: nāpi kasyaciddharmasya saṅgena pratyupasthitā na bandhanena |
631:517: asaktā iti suvikrāntavikrāmin na teṣāṃ kaścinmocayitā,
631:525: yataśca nopalabhyate yaḥ saṃyujyate vā badhyeta vā,
631:541: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattva āsanno bhavatyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ |
631:543: imāmahaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin mudrāṃ sthāpayāmi bodhisattvānāṃ saṃśayacchedāya prajñāpāramitāmabhiyuktānāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratām |
631:545: na pratibalā mama śrāvakā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudrāṃ paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ dhārayitum ||
631:546: atha khalu bhagavān bhadrapālasusārthavāhapūrvaṃgamāni pañcamātrāṇi bodhisattvaśatānyāmantrayate sma suvikrāntavikrāmiṇaṃ ca bodhisattvam-śakyatha yūyaṃ kulaputrāstathāgate parinirvṛte paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimikāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ saddharmāntardhānakālasamaye saddharmavipralope vartamāne saṃkṣīṇakāle imaṃ tathāgatasya anekakalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrasamudānītaṃ dharmaratnakoṣaṃ prajñāpāramitāpūrvaṃgamaṃ prajñāpāramitāprabhavaṃ prajñāpāramitāpratiṣṭhānaṃ dhārayitum,
631:548: evamukte bodhisattvā bhagavantametadavocat-śakyāmo vayaṃ bhagavan imaṃ tathāgatasya anekakalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrasamudānītamanuttaraṃ dharmaratnakoṣaṃ prajñāpāramitāpūrvaṃgamaṃ prajñāpāramitāprabhavaṃ prajñāpāramitāpratiṣṭhānaṃ dhārayitum,
631:550: kiṃcāpi bhagavan sa kālo mahābhayo mahākāntāro mahāghoraśca bhaviṣyati,
631:551: yadbhūyasā ca tasmin samaye sattvāḥ saddharmavyavanasaṃvartanīyena karmaṇā samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti,
631:552: viṣamalobhalubdhā viṣamarāgaraktā adharmarāgaraktā īrṣyālobhaparītacetasaḥ krodhanāścaṇḍāḥ paruṣāḥ durvacasaḥ śaṭhāḥ kuhakā māyāvino'dharmacāriṇaḥ kalahabhaṇḍanavivādavigrahabahulā asaṃvarasthitāḥ lubdhā lobhābhibhūtāḥ kusīdāḥ hīnavīryā muṣitasmṛtayo'saṃprajñāstuṇḍāḥ mukharāḥ pragalbhā antarhṛdayapraticchannapāpakarmāṇaḥ utsadarāgadveṣamohā avidyāṇḍakoṣatamomohāndhakārābhibhūtā mārapakṣānukūlacāriṇaḥ pratyarthikāśca bhaviṣyanti,
631:553: asya gambhīrasya dharmavinayasya dharmaratnakoṣasya apratyudgatamanaḥśīlāśca bhaviṣyanti,
631:554: atha ca punarutsahāmahe vayaṃ bhagavan imaṃ tathāgatasya anekakalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrakuśalamūlasamudānītamanuttaraṃ dharmaratnakoṣaṃ dhārayituṃ vācayitum,
631:555: ye ca tasminnantakāle parīttaparīttā api sattvā bhaviṣyanti ebhirdharmairarthikāḥ,
631:566: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmidaṃ dharmādhiṣṭhānaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśamadhitiṣṭhiti sma,
631:567: mārasya ca pāpīyaso'smin dharmaparyāye mārapāśānāṃ chedāya adhiṣṭhānamakarot |
631:568: atha khalu bhagavān smitaṃ prāviṣkaroti sma,
631:575: mahāntaṃ ca nirnādanirghoṣamakārṣuḥ-mahādhiṣṭhānaṃ batedaṃ tathāgatenādhiṣṭhitaṃ yatrāgatirmārāṇāṃ pāpīyasām |
631:576: sarvamārapāśa hi cchinnā anena dharmādhiṣṭhānena ca |
631:577: teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca bhūyo mārebhyaḥ pāpīyobhyo'bhayaṃ pratikāṅkṣitavyam |
631:578: ye imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyanti,
631:580: māraṃ ca te pāpīyāṃsaṃ sasainyaṃ parājayiṣyanti ye imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti,
631:585: baddhasīmā suvikrāntavikrāmin mārāṇāṃ pāpīyasāmasmin dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe tathāgatena |
631:586: ye'tra khalu punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā imaṃ dharmaparyāyamudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti,
631:589: anākramaṇīyāśca te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca bhaviṣyanti māraiḥ pāpīyobhiḥ |
631:593: na khalu punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin ayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ saṃkliṣṭānāṃ sattvānāṃ hastaṃ gamiṣyati,
631:597: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye te bhaviṣyanti hastyājāneyā vā aśvājāneyā vā,
631:603: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin manuṣyājāneyānāṃ sattvānāmime evaṃrūpā dharmaparyāyāḥ paribhogāya hastaṃ gamiṣyanti |
631:604: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin upoṣadho nāgarājaḥ supratiṣṭhitaśca nāgarājaḥ airāvaṇo nāgarājaḥ |
631:607: nāpi te anyeṣāṃ devānāmupabhogāya paribhogāya saṃkrāmanti,
631:609: yathā yathā ca śakro devānāmindro'bhikrāmati vyūhaṃ kṛtvā,
631:610: tathā tathā cāpi nāgarājānastādṛśameva vyūhaṃ kṛtvā upasaṃkrāmanti paribhogāya |
631:611: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin ye te bhaviṣyanti manuṣyendrāḥ puruṣendrāḥ teṣāmime dharmaparyāyā upabhogaparibhogāya bhaviṣyanti,
631:613: teṣāṃ ceme dharmaparyāyā mahāvyūhā mahāviṣkārā mahādharmālokā bhaviṣyanti,
631:616: asya dharmaparyāyasya ekaṃ nayaṃ ye dhārayiṣyanti,
631:617: kaḥ punarvādo ye sakalasamāptaṃ lekhayitvā dhārayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyanti vaistārikaṃ ca kariṣyanti,
631:619: parigṛhītāste khalu punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin anena dharmaparyāyeṇa bhaviṣyanti |
631:622: asmin khalu punardharmaparyāye bhagavatā bhāṣyamāṇe anekairaprameyairbodhisattvairanutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhābhūt |
631:624: niyatāśca te tathāgatena nirdiṣṭā abhūvan bodhāya ||
631:634: sarvākāramidaṃ vadanti munayo viśvaṃ yayā saṃgatā-
631:636: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat |
631:637: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodho evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ || 2 ||
